sentences.en: He met a crabbed, cantankerous director.
sentences.cn: 他碰上了一位坏脾气、爱争吵的主管。

sentences.en: He was nothing but a narrow, ignorant, and cantankerous sea -- faring man .
sentences.cn: 他只不过是个狭隘无知 、 脾气 暴戾 的海员而已.

sentences.en: Sometimes they can be cantankerous, mean - spirited, unkind, and sometimes downright cruel.
sentences.cn: 有时候,他们可能脾气古怪, 心胸狭窄, 不友善, 有时简直是残酷的.

sentences.en: The cantankerous bus driver rouse on the children for singing.
sentences.cn: 那个坏脾气的公共汽车司机因为孩子们唱歌而骂他们.

sentences.en: This " troubleshooter " listened and let the cantankerous customer enjoy himself pouring out his tirade.
sentences.cn: 这位 [ 调解员 ] 去那里后,静静听着.尽量让这位好争论的老先生,发泄他满肚子的牢骚.

words.tran_cn: 不怀好意地；脾气不好地
易怒的;卑鄙的;好打架的
